definition: the option to buy or sell a given stock at a given price before a given date, range or extend over
details:
noun
- the option to buy or sell a given stock at a given price before a given date
= example: the option to buy or sell a given stock at a given price before a given date
- the act of sitting or standing astride
= synonyms: span
- a gymnastic exercise performed with a leg on either side of the parallel bars
- a noncommittal or equivocal position
verb
- range or extend over
= synonyms: range
- be noncommittal
- sit or stand astride of
